what: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: R functions retrieve DFO data housed internally often associated package gulf (e.g., , , ), perform downstream processing quality control prior analysis.

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: fully functional get.gulf available DFO Gulf Fisheries staff -house gulf package well access \\ENT.dfo-mpo.ca\dfo-mpo\GROUP\GLF\Regional_Shares\AquaRes_Common\FishFramSci.

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: Years: 1971 - 2024 Vessels: E.E. Prince (1971 - 1985) fishing Yankee-36 trawl Lady Hammond (1985 - 1991) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Alfred Needler (1992 - 2002, 2004 - 2005) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Wilfred Templeman (2003) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Teleost (2004 - 2022) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Capt. Jacques Cartier (2021 - 2024), fishing modified version Northeast Fisheries Science Center Ecosystem Survey Trawl, NEST (trawl details Denton 2020; modifications outlined Ricard et al. 2023).

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: get.gulf currently applies vessel correction factors years 1993 onward catches adjusted vessel effects, non-Teleost catches adjusted Teleost equivalents adjust catches CCGS Alfred Needler CCGS Wilfred Templeman, get.gulf applies vessel correction factors described Benoît 2006. adjust cathes CCGS Capt. Jacques Cartier, get.gulf applies vessel correction factors described Benoît 2006, Benoît Yin, 2023. See ?get_catch

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: get.gulf applies diel correction factors night catches made CCGS Teleost, night catches adjusted equivalent CCGS Teleost. Correction factors used get.gulf described Benoît Swain, 2003a, Benoît Swain, 2003b, Benoît 2006. Diel correction factors implemented specific species, years 1993 onward. See ?get_catch.

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: Commercial landings data go back 1985. get.gulf retrieves data housed DFO Quebec Region. See ?get_ziff.
